let's send some of our other Alps from the camp.
(Gümüştekin) So, what do you say, son?

text: Gidip Selcan Hatun'u geri getirelim Gündoğdu abi.
english: 's go and bring Selcan Hatun back, Gündoğdu brother.

text: Evet Hamza, sadık ve yiğit bir savaşçı olduğunu bir kez daha gösterdin.
english: Yes, Hamza, you have once again proven yourself to be a loyal and valiant warrior. There were

text: Senden şüphe ettiğim zamanlar da oldu.
Ama sen beni yanılttın. Zor zamanlarda beni arkamdan vurmadın.
english: But you disappointed me. You didn't betray me during difficult times.

text: (Hamza) Ben her zaman senin yanındaydım Noyan.
english: (Hamza) I was always by your side, Noyan.
(Hamza) But your doubts don't hurt me.
I could have been like Abdurrahman.

text: Senden bir yardım daha isterim Hamza.
english: I need one more thing from you, Hamza.

text: Gündoğdu'nun yalnız gelmeyeceğini çocuklar bile bilir.
english: Even children know that Gündoğdu won't come alone.

text: Yanına askerleri alasın ve cehennem vadisine gelesin.
english: Take your soldiers with you and come to the valley of hell.
When Gündoğdu arrives, wait for my signal.
Kill everyone who is around him.

text: -(Gündoğdu) Ellerin dert görmesin beyim. -(Artuk) Eyvallah beyim.
english: -(Gündoğdu) May your hands be blessed, sir. -(Artuk) Thank you, sir.
Bring Selcan Hatun back safe and sound.
(Music) In the name of Allah, the

text: (Artuk iç ses) Devletler kurup devletler yıkan Ak sakallılara...
english: (Artuk's inner voice) To the white-bearded elders who establish and destroy states...
Greetings from Artuk, who is on a mission.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Oğuz Kağan'ın mührü Sungur Tekin ile obaya gelmiştir.
english: (Artuk's inner voice) Oğuz Kağan's seal has arrived at the encampment with Sungur Tekin.
(Artuk's inner voice) But he got lost in the camp.

text: Selcan Hatun'u almak için Tuğtekin'le gidecekler.
english: They will go with Tuğtekin to pick up Selcan Hatun.

text: Sen ne dersin ağabey? Daha dün gece konuştuk.
english: What do you say, big brother? We spoke just last night. That

text: Tuğtekin ahmağı kahraman olma sevdası peşinde hâlâ.
english: fool Tuğtekin is still chasing the dream of becoming a hero.

text: Konuştuklarımız bir kulağından girip ötekinden çıkmış.
english: What we said went in one ear and out the other . She couldn't say

text: Nasıl olacak peki? Noyan'ın istediği mühür bizde.
english: How will that happen then? We have the seal that Noyan wanted. Is
this man going to his death?

text: Belki de Gündoğdu'yla Tuğtekin'in ölmesi daha çok işimize gelir.
english: Perhaps it would be more beneficial for us if Gündoğdu and Tuğtekin died.

text: Belli ki ikisi de sözlerimizin peşine takılmayacak kadar kibirli ve budala.
english: Clearly, both of them are too arrogant and foolish to heed our words. If

text: Belki de böylesi daha iyi olur.
english: Perhaps this is for the best.
Noyan is also after this seal...
... it means Saadettin Köpek is in my hands.

text: Alpler hazır beyim. Oba girişinde sizi bekler.
english: The Alps are ready, my lord. He'll be waiting for you at the entrance of the village.
We'll go along the streambed. Just in case

text: Olur da bizi gözetliyorlarsa yola çıktığımızı bilmesinler.
english: they are watching us, we do n't want them to know we've set off. Yes sir.
God give you strength, sir. May

text: Ablam için cenge giderek bana dünyaları verdin.
english: going to war for my sister, you gave me the world. May

text: Allah da iki cihanda seni kutlu kılsın.
english: God bless you in both worlds.

text: Demir Usta, sen burada anamın yanında kalasın.
english: Master Demir, you stay here with my mother.
My lord, how could I leave you alone?

text: Anamın sana bizden daha çok ihtiyacı vardır usta.
english: My mother needs you more than we do, master.

text: Emrin üzerine dere yatağında bekleyeceğiz beyim.
english: As you ordered, we will wait in the riverbed, sir.

text: Siz yola düşün. Ben size yetişirim.
english: You set off on your journey. I'll catch up with you. I know I have no

text: Sana gitme demeye hakkım yoktur, bilirim beyim.
english: right to tell you not to go , sir.

text: Sana korkak ol demeye de hakkım yoktur.
english: no right to tell you to be a coward.

text: Lakin cesur ol ve gitme beyim.
english: But be brave and don't go, my lord.
I couldn't bear it if something happened to you.

text: Goncagül Hatun, Azrail'in nefesi her daim ensemizdedir.
english: Goncagül Hatun, the breath of the Angel of Death is always on our necks.

text: ...hepsi bir olup bizi bir felakete sürüklemek isterler.
english: ...they all conspire to drag us into disaster.

text: Goncagül denilen o şirret avradın asıl derdi Gündoğdu Bey'im değildir Halime.
english: That shrewish woman named Goncagül's real problem isn't Gündoğdu Bey, Halime.

text: Onların hepsinin tek bir isteği vardır.
(Selcan dış ses) Süleyman Şah'ımın bize emanetini isterler.
english: (Selcan's voiceover) They want the entrusted item of my Suleiman Shah. They

text: Önce Dodurga, sonra Kayı otağına kurulmak isterler.
english: first wanted to set up camp in Dodurga, then in the Kayı encampment.

text: Ona bir şey olursa ne ederim ben?
english: What would I do if something happened to her? Don't

text: Gündoğdu Bey'im Selcan'ı sağ salim getirecek obaya.
english: Mr. Gündoğdu will bring Selcan back to the camp safe and sound. Do
you think so, Halime Hatun? Of course

text: Gönlünü ferah tut. Sen yanlış bir şey yapmadın.
english: Keep your spirits up. You didn't do anything wrong.

text: Yaptığına yanlış diyorsan da telafisi yok değildir.
english: Even if you say what you did was wrong, it's not irreparable.

text: Bulduğun vakit göreceksin. Bütün musibetler bir bir son bulacak.
english: You'll see when you find it. All calamities will come to an end, one by one.

text: (Ertuğrul) Yolumuzun ilk günü epey bereketli geçti Alpler.
english: (Ertuğrul) Our first day on the Alps was quite fruitful.

text: (Turgut) Şu bozkırda her taşın altından biz çıkarız beyim.
english: (Turgut) We can be found under every stone in this steppe, sir. Let

text: Dur bakalım, hangi taşın altında kalacağız?
english: 's wait and see, which rock will we end up under next?

text: Ee taşlar da sağlam dursun kardeş.
english: Well, let's make sure the stones stay firmly in place, brother.

text: Beyim, bu heybenin içine taş mı koydun ya?
english: Sir, did you put stones in this bag?

text: (Bamsı) Gayrı kuvveti de feri de gitti bizim oğlanın.
english: (Bamsi) Our boy has lost all his strength and energy.

text: Demek Kirmani Efendi'nin tedarikli olun dediği buymuş.
english: So this is what Kirmani Efendi meant when he said to be prepared.
our tent and take whatever they want...
...it is our duty to find the one who did this.
Mother, if the people hear about this...
...things will get worse. We need to investigate

text: Bu mesele ahalinin kulağına çalınmadan şüphelendiklerimizin üzerinden gitmeliyiz.
english: our suspicions before this matter becomes public knowledge.

text: Sen ne dersin kızım? Bildiğin bir şey mi vardır?
english: What do you say, my daughter? Do you know something?

text: ...otağımıza çok rahat girip çıkan biridir ana.
english: ...is someone who comes and goes from our tent very easily, mother.
I know, he grew up in your hands.

text: Lakin Gökçe bu otağda konuşulanları başka yerlere taşır.
english: However, Gökçe takes what is discussed in this tent to other places. He is responsible for what happened to

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imin başına gelenlerin sorumlusu odur, sen de bilirsin.
english: my Ertuğrul Bey , you know that too. And she's

text: Üstelik tek başına da değil ana.
Gökçe, Goncagül ve Aytolun'un oyunlarına alet olduğunun farkında değil ana.
english: Gökçe doesn't realize she's being used as a pawn in Goncagül and Aytolun's games, mother.

text: ...sen neler bilirsin de bana demezsin ha? De hele!
english: ...what do you know that you won't tell me, huh? Come on !

text: Ana, Goncagül, Gündoğdu Bey'imin hatunu olacak. Saygım sonsuz.
english: Ana, Goncagül, will be the wife of Mr. Gündoğdu. I have the utmost respect.

text: Lakin gördüklerim ve duyduklarım susmama mani olur.
english: But what I've seen and heard prevents me from remaining silent .
The night we had dinner together in the tent...

text: ...Goncagül ve Gökçe'yi Sungur Tekin Bey'imin otağına girerken gördüm.
english: ...I saw Goncagül and Gökçe entering Mr. Sungur Tekin's tent.

text: Yaptıklarını Gündoğdu Bey'im yanına kor mu sandın ha?
english: Mr. Gündoğdu would get away with what you did, huh? Did

text: Gündoğdu bir gün daha görür mü sanmıştın?
english: you think Gündoğdu would see another day?

text: Belli ki Ertuğrul Bey'imin yaptıkları pek bir zoruna gitmiş.
english: Clearly, what Ertuğrul Bey did has really upset her. You've reached the point of seeking

text: Hainlerden medet umar hale geldiğine göre ne yaptığını bilemez olmuşsun.
english: help from traitors; you must not know what you're doing.

text: Lakin Gündoğdu'm gelecek. Aha bu ıssız yerlerde...
english: But Gündoğdu will come. In these desolate places...

text: ...senin o pis leşini aç hayvanlara yem edecek.
english: ...they'll feed your filthy carcass to hungry animals.
Everyone will get their turn. Everyone.
First Gündoğdu will die, then Ertuğrul.
But first of all, you will die.

text: Benden emir gelene dek kimse hareket etmesin. Anlaşıldı mı?
english: No one should move until I give the order . Understood?
my brother Gündoğdu is rescuing Selcan Hatun...
...the seal is at the camp. You're

text: Lakin obada mührün sırrını başka kim bilir ki?
english: But who else in the village knows the secret of the seal ?

text: Obayı sen benden daha iyi bilirsin Artuk Bey.
english: You know the village better than I do, Artuk Bey. Do
Tell me, sir. Who do you suspect?

text: Lakin mührü çalan kişi Moğolların adamı değildir.
english: However, the person who stole the seal was not a Mongol agent. No one outside of

text: Mührün sırrını Sultan Alaeddin'in yakın çevresinden başka kimse bilmez.
english: Sultan Alaeddin's inner circle knows the secret of the seal .
...protect our children and our communities from calamities. Do
n't withhold your help from us. Please, Lord, don't
withdraw your hand from us. We have no
betrayal having infiltrated even our homes... no
one but you can protect us.
...is not just happening in our village anymore, brother.
We don't know who to trust. Not a
being shaken by a new betrayal.
What made you say these things, Hayme?
We have now purged the traitors from our tribe. When

text: Ertuğrul, Kocabaş'ın kellesini aldığında ben de senin gibi düşünmüştüm.
english: Ertuğrul beheaded Kocabaş, I thought the same thing as you.
But I was wrong. Traitors still
roam freely in our village... Something very valuable,

text: ...Noyan'ın istediği çok kıymetli bir şey çalınmıştır abi.
english: requested by Noyan, has been stolen from my tent, brother.

text: Kim yapar bunu? Bu nasıl olur?
english: Who would do this? How is this possible?
In our village, among us, in our tent...

text: Gel bakalım obanın akıllı oğlanı. Gel hele.
english: Come here, clever boy of the village. Come here.
...after your home was destroyed, which den did you crawl into? The

text: Dağ taş benim inimdir akıllı oğlan.
english: mountains and rocks are my den, clever boy.
(Noyan) I heard you took a second wife.

text: O yüzden gelmezsin derdim ama esaslı ermişsin.
english: That's why I would have said you wouldn't come, but you're a true saint.
You haven't forgotten your first wife either. Keep it
